title: My Taxonomy Snippet
code:
<?php
// Register Custom Taxonomy
function custom_taxonomy_taxonomy() {

$labelsArr

	$args = array(
		'labels' => $labels,
		'public' => true,
		'show_ui' => true,
		'show_in_rest' => true,
		'rewrite' => array( 'slug' => 'custom_taxonomy' ),
		'hierarchical' => false
	);

	register_taxonomy( 'custom_taxonomy', array( 'post' ), $args );

}
add_action( 'init', 'custom_taxonomy_taxonomy', 0 );
?>
